item.title: [GRINDWELL] Grindwell Norton Ltd. Receives Demand Drop Order from Office of Assistant Commissioner of Commercial Taxes, Bengaluru
item.description:
Grindwell Norton Ltd. has received a demand drop order from the Office of the Assistant Commissioner of Commercial Taxes, Bengaluru. The Company was served with a Show Cause Notice amounting to 322,59,706, but after filing a reply, the demand has been reduced to 'Nil'. The order was received on February 28, 2026, in response to the Show Cause Notice. There is no material impact on the financial, operational, or other activities of the Company.

item.description:

Adani Defence Systems & Technologies Ltd (ADSTL), a wholly owned subsidiary of Adani Enterprises Ltd, has signed a Share Purchase Agreement (SPA) with Punj Lloyd Aviation Ltd (PLAL) to acquire a 14.2% stake in Air Works India (Engineering) Private Ltd. Post completion of the acquisition, ADSTL's stake in Air Works will increase to 99.98%. The acquisition is expected to give ADSTL special rights such as the right to appoint directors, first right to share subscription in case of issuance of shares, and the right to restrict any change in capital structure.

item.title: [ABCAPITAL] Aditya Birla Capital Ltd: Chief Technology Officer, Ramesh Narayanaswamy, Resigns
item.description:
Aditya Birla Capital Limited has announced the resignation of its Chief Technology Officer, Mr. Ramesh Narayanaswamy. According to the company's disclosure, Mr. Narayanaswamy has tendered his resignation to pursue opportunities outside the company, with his last day being 28 February 2026. The company has provided all the necessary details as per the SEBI Master Circular No. HO/49/14/14(7)2025-CFD-POD2/1/3762/2026 dated January 30, 2026. The resignation letter from Mr. Narayanaswamy is also enclosed in the disclosure.

  • Aditya Birla Capital Limited announces the resignation of its Chief Technology Officer, Mr. Ramesh Narayanaswamy.
  • Mr. Narayanaswamy has resigned to pursue opportunities outside the company.
  • His last working day will be 28 February 2026.
  • The company has disclosed all necessary details as per SEBI regulations.
  • The resignation letter from Mr. Narayanaswamy is also provided in the disclosure.
